docna.cdata!:
Gambia - Second Structural Adjustment Credit
            : Credit 2032 - Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Gambia - Second Structural
            Adjustment Credit : Credit 2032 - Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Structural Adjustment Credit
            will support the second phase (1988/89 - 1990-91) of the
            Economic Recovery Program (ERP). It will assist the
            Government's efforts to build a stronger base for
            long-term growth combined with sustainable balance of
            payments and public finance positions. While the major
            policies of the first phase of the ERP will be retained for
            the second phase, the program focuses most specifically on
            measures to: (i) reduce the fiscal deficit and increase the
            efficiency of government expenditures and public investment;
            (ii) strengthen the performance of the agricultural sector,
            including reforms in groundnut processing/marketing policies
            and institutions; and (iii) improve public sector
            management, including civil service reforms and a
            comprehensive reform of the Gambia Commercial and
            Development Bank, and steps to improve the performance and
            focus the role of public enterprises.
